function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Presence of hazardous chemical pollutants such as VOCs, CO, and SO2 in indoor environments","Impact":"Health issues including nausea, headache, dizziness, tiredness, and respiratory problems","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation, use of air purifiers, and reduction of chemical products","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, and indoor air quality monitors","People":"Individuals in indoor environments, especially those with pre-existing health conditions","Owner":"Building owners, environmental health agencies"},{"Description":"Ground-level ozone as a cause of respiratory health diseases","Impact":"Respiratory system diseases and health issues","Mitigation":"Reducing emissions from vehicles and industrial sources, promoting green spaces","Technologies":"Emission control systems, green infrastructure, and urban planning","People":"Population in urban areas exposed to high ozone levels","Owner":"Environmental agencies, urban planners, and policy makers"},{"Description":"Health risks associated with high CO2 concentration in indoor air","Impact":"Fatigue, headaches, vomiting, dizziness, and loss of concentration","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation, monitoring and controlling indoor CO2 levels","Technologies":"Indoor air quality monitors, ventilation systems, and CO2 scrubbers","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building owners, employers"}]}
